name: Gravity Ball (itch) (Josh Simpson)
description:
This game was made as part of 'Game a Week 3 - Scroll Wheel Only' for Uni.

Using only the scroll wheel the player must navigate the ball to the goal by changing the gravity scale.

The current iteration (v1) features a total of three playable levels, I’d love to add more along with additional features in the future.

Let me know what you think!
